title: "How Alexandr Wang Turned An Army Of Clickworkers Into A $7.3 Billion AI Unicorn"
excerpt: "He briefly became the world’s youngest self-made billionaire by supplying AI companies with the one thing they all need: humans. Hundreds of thousands of them. Now Wang’s $7.3 billion startup Scale AI is primed to cash in on the biggest AI boom yet—unless someone else can do it better or cheaper."
